actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage. If this damage would reduce a Small or larger target to 0 hit points  the target takes no damage from this attack.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The weasel has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.
